description:
Orange Seals Endurance formula is said to last 2-3x longer than their original formula, which means more riding, and less time refilling your tires. This biodegradable sealant is a blend of fast-setting latex and mixed-sized particles that dam punctures upto ¼-inch quickly and effectively.

  • Includes 237ml bottle of sealant with injector cap and hose
  • Maintains performance at extreme temperatures and altitudes
  • Made from biodegradable ingredients
  • Adding sealant to a tire only adds only 120g of weight to a wheel
name: Orange Seal Tubeless Tire Sealant with Injection System
